item.title: Boost Your .NET Projects: Unleashing the Power of Spargineâ€™s EncryptionHelper
item.description: Spargine is a set of open-source .NET 8 packages created by the author since .NET 2, currently in production. It includes the EncryptionHelper class, which offers efficient methods for data encryption, key generation, and password verification. Link to article: https://dotnettips.wordpress.com/2024/12/29/boost-your-net-projects-unleashing-the-power-of-spargines-encryptionhelper/
